root.Title: Henry King,
root.descrip: Who chewed bits of String, and was early cut off in Dreadful Agonies.

lg.l: The Chief Defect of Henry King

picture.interp: A man is chewing on the rope.

lg.l: At last he swallowed some which tied
Were called at once; but when they came

picture.interp: Two men are looking at each other.

lg.l: “There is no Cure for this Disease.
Henry will very soon be dead.”
His Parents stood about his Bed
When Henry, with his Latest Breath,
“Oh, my Friends, be warned by me,

picture.interp: A man is sitting on the bed.

lg.l: That Breakfast, Dinner, Lunch and Tea
Are all the Human Frame requires ...”
With that the Wretched Child expires.
